text: Ra tyo samaya smarana garnu yogya cha jabaki tapa'iko palanakartale yo kura bhan'yoh ki usale yi yahudiharumathi kiyamatasam'ma yasto vyaktila'i avasya niyukta garirakhne cha, jasale uniharula'i dukhad sajaya di'i rahanecha. Nihsandeha timro palanahara chitai sajaya di'ihalcha, ra avasya u bado ksamasila, atyanta dayavana cha
